name: cnsoft's projects at github
body:
# kbengine_cocos2dx_demo/

[cocos2dx_demo] (/kbengine_cocos2dx_demo/)  which integrated KBE engine + cocos2d-x. 

> Oct 8 2014 Alpha is checked in.

# Indie Game Project:

## SuperBombeCrush : 

Nov 23 2014 : published .
 
https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/super-bombe-crush-lite/id921365155?mt=8&uo=4 
![Apple Store](http://linkmaker.itunes.apple.com/htmlResources/assets/en_us//images/web/linkmaker/badge_appstore-lrg.png)

![](http://a5.mzstatic.com/us/r30/Purple1/v4/d9/3c/b7/d93cb78d-d353-5c1a-44f7-1ad233c0d990/icon175x175.jpeg)
> Super Bombe Crush Lite is a light action game. 
Use joystick to control your hero , place bombe , kill monster ,destroy game object. collect stars.find the teleport door. 
Loot gold coin. gain high score ,challenge yourself. 

> 1. 20+ funny levels. 
2. Fantasy 3d particle system.
3. Real 3D game world. 
4. Various game item.


![Super Bombe](http://ww3.sinaimg.cn/mw690/b16bbe8atw1emks0pcy9hj20sg0lcdn2.jpg) 

Alpha Version. support iPhone series.
![](http://ww2.sinaimg.cn/mw690/b16bbe8agw1em9a4gh7mdj20sg0lcq43.jpg)

> Summary info
This project is developed based cocos2d-x v2.x , 3D part is get support from  xOrigo engine. Yes, we can do 3D game on 2D engine. much more game detail are planning and will be implemented soon. 

1.1.5 version：A playable single mode bomber man game. it is created for bomberman game fans. 

1.2. bless we can finish it in time, if so we will add server based levels updated feature. to provide more challenge levels. After that, we will add real-time mode. Leaderboard feature.

Any suggestion , contact me : cnsoft#gmail.com  or  Weibo @糊涂cnsoft 
#Other Project:
[Photon-IsLand-MMO-Patch](/Photon-IsLand-MMO-Patch/)  patched working photon demo.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
